item.title: Speaker - AwayDay 2019 - SLAM Aware Applications
item.description: Presented At : Thoutworks’s Awayday 2019, where the entire ThoughtWorks India travelled to celebrate togetherness. I and my colleague Raju Kandaswamy presented this talk in the breakout sessions in category Seismic Shifts Around 2000 Thoghtworkers get together, and enjoyed fusion of technology showcases, cultural event and more. Glimpse here The talk is about What is SLAM (Simultaneous Localization And Mapping)? The use cases of SLAM? How does it work?
